rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance that guides into the living area and connects to the courtyard

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living space with ample natural light from large windows facing the courtyard and the rooftop terrace. It includes a comfortable seating area and integrated entertainment system.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for casual dining with views of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact, modern kitchen with natural light, connected to a utility area and designed following Vastu principles for energy flow. Large windows open towards the courtyard.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace featuring large window openings facing east for natural light, designed with minimal distractions and a focus on productivity while maintaining privacy from the main living area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light, overlooking the central courtyard and ensuring Vastu alignment. Includes an ensuite bathroom attached.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed to offer personal space, with natural light from windows aligned according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring adequate space for a bachelor pad layout, positioned optimally relative to the central courtyard and entrance.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Shared)
rooms.description: Secondary bathroom located centrally for guests, designed with natural lighting and ventilation.

details.description: Large window openings ensuring ample daylight in the living and kitchen areas.
